alert.note: Alert for Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:11PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Power and east central Cassia Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 210 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Cold Water Rest Area, or 17 miles northeast of Malta, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockland, Cold Water Rest Area and Massacre Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region
